channel.title: Need help with Pi client
channel.description:
hey i just need help with setting up a pi server and client i already downloaded a source and client but when i ran server its good but client when i run it turns black with the red loader saying error connecting to server report problem and i though maybe it was that client so i downloaded another client and samething so im guessing to make pi clients work i gotta do something special? if someone could please help me i would greatly appreciate it
notes to consider. i didint set up a no - ip yet or portforwarded or anything this is new computer i just got jdk and stuff but i should still be able to connect to server on port 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 also i tried to do what most people would say move the cache to c drive done that and stuff but i still cant get it to work. I think i am doing that part wrong though :/ my msn/hotmail is hellykid9595@hotmail.com i am on that mostly all day add me there if yu can help or reply here thanks

item.title: Need help with Pi client
item.dc:creator: @xxterror95xx xxterror95xx
item.description:
@xxterror95xx wrote:

[quote=“ipwnunoobs, post:3, topic:392138”]Wow, theres like a dozen threads about this. Check in your client.java and search for “server =” change it to your IP.[/quote] -.- i said i didint make a no - ip yet and i obviously checked that the server ip is at 0.0.0.0 or at 127.0.0.1 I am not retarted lol and whoever does not change their ip first thing should not make a server because they fail lol

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Pi client
item.dc:creator: @xxterror95xx xxterror95xx
item.description:
@xxterror95xx wrote:

hey i just need help with setting up a pi server and client i already downloaded a source and client but when i ran server its good but client when i run it turns black with the red loader saying error connecting to server report problem and i though maybe it was that client so i downloaded another client and samething so im guessing to make pi clients work i gotta do something special? if someone could please help me i would greatly appreciate it

notes to consider.
i didint set up a no - ip yet or portforwarded or anything this is new computer i just got jdk and stuff but i should still be able to connect to server on port 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1
also i tried to do what most people would say move the cache to c drive done that and stuff but i still cant get it to work. I think i am doing that part wrong though
my msn/hotmail is hellykid9595@hotmail.com i am on that mostly all day add me there if yu can help or reply here thanks
